name: Tractor Pull Vs Tow Truck
description:
Do you love playing tow truck car transport and tractor pull games? If yes then welcome to off road truck towing game where you pick up different accidental cars, big rigs, rescue truck, limo, monster trucks and tow different vehicles to specified places. This off-road transporter game is unique because it is mission based and you will have incredible fun by playing this tow car game 2018. The lifted truck is heavy duty vehicle for tractor pulling on uphill mountain. While transporting sports cars and busted pickups avoid wrong way racing on hills because the off-road is muddy due to which your heavy tractor may stuck.

You will drive tow truck on different off-road tracks to hook the stuck oil tanker, garbage truck, taxi and sports car to the garage. We will give you limited time to complete your cargo transport level otherwise level will be failed in tow car racing game. You will drive tow cars and farming tractors on different hills and mountains to provide real rescue shuttle service to dump vehicles.

During downhill driving slow down the speed of lifter because the cargo weight is heavy to transport and the breaks may fail due to fast truck speed. Accuracy and legend driving skills is essential for playing this new tow truck driving simulator game of 2018.

How To play Car Tow Truck Transporter:
Drive the tow cars and trucks by towing different vehicles from one place to another for towing service. Complete the tasks as fast as possible by avoiding any off-road accidents during cargo transportation on outback hills.
